QuestData.Title: Feeding An Army
QuestData.Description: We've had a chance to work with these beasts for a while now, and that's allowed us to develop a brand-new trap for you to try out. It should be much sturdier than the last one!$B$BMind giving 'er a run, commander? The Improved Iron Trap will let you capture some of the meatiest wildlife, like the big boars and riverbeasts out in Gorgrond. We'll be able to turn them into some tasty steaks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Improved Iron Trap to capture a Boar or Riverbeast in Gorgrond and then place a Work Order at your Barn.
